deviation.name: Fissure Cascade
deviation.description: Fissures rip into the mission, causing the Enemy Level to go up by 1 every 10s. Destroy them to stop the level from increasing further.

riskVariables.name: Bold Venture
riskVariables.description: Enemies deal -15% Damage and take +15% Damage but gain +15% Movement Speed, Attack Speed, and Fire Rate.

riskVariables.name: Alluring Arcocanids
riskVariables.description: As Rogue Arcocanids charge attacks, they pull Warframes towards them.

deviation.name: Unified Purpose
deviation.description: Enemies can target and destroy Conduits.

riskVariables.name: Postmortal Surges
riskVariables.description: Slain enemies burts with Void energy.

deviation.name: Relentless Tide
deviation.description: The Fragmented Tide never stops attacking.

riskVariables.name: Myopic Munitions
riskVariables.description: Enemies will only take damage if a player is within 15m of them.

riskVariables.name: Bolstered Belligerents
riskVariables.description: All enemies have Overguard equal to 50% of their max health.

personalModifiers.name: Secondary Wounds
personalModifiers.description: Gain 1 Puncture Status Effect every time you take damage.

personalModifiers.name: Fractured Armor
personalModifiers.description: Casting an ability reduces armor by 10% for 10s.

personalModifiers.name: Powerless
personalModifiers.description: All Abilities are disabled until the squad kills 50 enemies.
